name: Ecotopia
description:
Summary

Ecotopia is a city-builder game where the player follows Amélie Jam, a young architect who must help a condemned city, by transforming it to a green city model. Furthermore, with the global warming, the player must build his city efficiently to limit his carbon footprint, and try to reverse the warm from the global warming.

The game was made at the Climate Game Jam 2017, organised by Hakatah. It was realised with the Game Campus team.
